name: SKAdNetwork
desc: A class that validates advertisement-driven app installations.

items.name: property list key SKAdNetworkItems
items.desc: An array of dictionaries containing a list of ad network identifiers.

items.name: property list key NSAdvertisingAttributionReportEndpoint
items.desc: The URL where Private Click Measurement and SKAdNetwork send attribution information.

items.name: class SKAdImpression
items.desc: A class that defines an ad impression for a view-through ad.

items.name: class func startImpression(SKAdImpression, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Indicates that your app is presenting a view-through ad to the user.

items.name: class func endImpression(SKAdImpression, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Indicates that your app is no longer presenting a view-through ad to the user.

items.name: class func updatePostbackConversionValue(Int, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Verifies the first launch of an advertised app and on subsequent calls, updates the conversion value or calls a completion hander if the update fails.
